descriptions.Claims No: Unique identifier for each claim submitted to the payer.
descriptions.Claim Line: Line item within the claim, representing a specific service or procedure.
descriptions.Member ID: Identifier for the patient/member receiving care.
descriptions.Provider ID: Identifier for the healthcare provider submitting the claim.
descriptions.Revenue Code: Department or type of service billed.
descriptions.Service Code: Internal code representing the type of service rendered.
descriptions.Procedure Code: CPT/HCPCS code describing the medical procedure performed.
descriptions.Procedure Description: Text description of the procedure code.
descriptions.Diagnosis: ICD-10 code representing the patient’s condition.
descriptions.Claim Charge Amount: Total amount billed for the claim line.
descriptions.Denial Reason Code: Code explaining why a claim was denied.
descriptions.In / Out Network: Indicates whether provider is in-network or out-of-network.
descriptions.Insurance Eligible Amount: Portion of claim eligible for insurance reimbursement.
descriptions.Group Index: Identifier for employer group or plan sponsor.
descriptions.Claim Status: Approved, Need to Review, Likely Deniable.
